    • isActionable

      public boolean isActionable​(Board board, Worker worker)
      Parameters:
      board - current board state
      worker - chosen worker
      Returns:
      if the godPower is actionable

    • godPowerRequired

      public int godPowerRequired​(Board board, Player player)
      Gets the worker's number if the only available move is guaranteed by the use of the GodPower
      Parameters:
      board - current board state
      player - chosen worker
      Returns:
      no available workers (-1), worker1 (1), worker2 (2), user's choice (0)

      public void applyOpponentConstraints​(java.util.List<Position> positions, Board board, Worker worker)
      Modifies the given list of positions applying godPower's constraints that are triggered during opponent's turn
      Parameters:
      positions - current list of valid positions
      board - current board state
      worker - chosen worker

      public boolean switchWorker()
      Returns:
      true if current turn phase needs to be executed with the Player's other worker

    • reset

      public void reset()

    • move

      public void move​(Worker worker, Board board, int row, int column)
      Default strategy for MOVE: sets worker position equals to the input cell
      Parameters:
      worker - worker that the player wants to move
      board - board state
      row - selected by the player where the worker will move
      column - selected by the player where the worker will move

    • build

      public void build​(Board board, int row, int column)
      Default strategy for BUILD: builds a level on the input cell
      Parameters:
      board - board state
      row - where the player wants to build
      column - where the player wants to build

    • checkWinCondition

      public boolean checkWinCondition​(Cell startCell, Cell endCell)
      Default strategy for WIN CONDITION: checks player's win condition comparing the position of the worker that is going to move with the position chosen for the movement
      Parameters:
      startCell - worker present cell
      endCell - worker future cell
